message.original: 剣による連続攻撃を繰り出す
message.translation: Perform a continuous attack with your sword.

message.original: 剣による連続一点集中攻撃を繰り出す
message.translation: Pausing after your first swing allows you to follow up with a powerful concentrated attack.

message.original: 剣による一撃で敵のガード状態を崩し気絶を誘う ボタンの長押しで威力が増し 敵を転倒させることができる <COL ffdc78>LV UPで攻撃威力が上昇し 長押しなしで敵を転倒させる＜強斬り崩し＞に進化</COL>
message.translation: Perform a strong overhead swing, holding down longer for increased power that's capable of breaking an enemies guard. It is also possible to topple the enemy. <COL ffdc78>LV UP Increase attack power Evolve into "Strong Guard Break" allowing you to guard break without max power.</COL>

message.original: 剣による渾身の一撃で敵のガード状態を崩し 転倒させる。さらに気絶させやすくなる ボタンの長押しで威力が増す
message.translation: Perform a stronger overhead swing capable of breaking an enemies guard, holding down longer for increased power. A longer hold has a better chance to topple.
Swing your sword while in the air.

message.original: 空中で剣を縦に振り下ろす 高所から行うことで威力が上昇する
message.translation: Slash downwards while airborne, falling down onto the enemy. Increased power at an increased height.

message.original: 盾を構え敵の攻撃を防ぐ 空中でも発動可能
message.translation: Hold your shield strong to block enemy attacks. Can also be activated while in the air.

message.original: 盾を素早く構え敵の攻撃をはじき返す 空中でも発動可能
message.translation: Timing your block just as the enemy attacks you, will deflect their attack. Can also be activated while in the air.

message.original: 腰を落とした姿勢で構え、 近接してきた仲間を上方に放りあげる
message.translation: Hold yourself in a crouched position, and toss nearby allies into the air.

message.original: 敵に吹き飛ばされた際に転倒を回避する
message.translation: Recover quickly from being knocked down by an enemy.

message.original: しがみついた状態から、剣を突き刺し連続してえぐる ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
message.translation: While clinging onto an enemy, thrust your sword into them. Continuous presses increase attack count.
